# Bladowo, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Bladowo  is a settlement in the administrative district of Gmina Lidzbark, within Działdowo County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  east of Lidzbark,  west of Działdowo, and  south-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
